alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Park, or over Riviera Beach, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Tequesta, Juno Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Cloud Lake, Port Of Palm Beach, North County Airport, Schall Circle, Juno Ridge, Downtown West Palm Beach, Palm Beach International Airport, The Acreage, Mangonia Park, Glen Ridge and Lakeside Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
